item.title: Hello_world
item.description: What 137.is? It is a tool that experiment in how a company can work, and see how much a fully distributed system is able to solve problems efficently. This project uses soft computing, on the opposite of hard computing, the terms “soft computing” and “hard computing” refer to two different approaches to problem solving. Hard computing, also known as “classical computing,” refers to the use of traditional, precise algorithms to solve problems.
